channel.title: firebase on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in firebase on Blog

item.title: Firebase and Swift
item.description: Hello! Per request of a friendly reddit user, I’m going to be doing a quick tutorial on using firebase with swift and how to structure your data models. Before we do anything, just a quick disclaimer, this tutorial is in swift 3, which, even though my life would be made much easier had I used swift 4 (google codeable swift 4), is the current default. Basic project setup: Single page application default in XCode Cocoapods to install Firebase You’ll be able to find the project’s link at the end of this guide.
